channel.title: Changing Home And The Shops
channel.description:
My home teleport isn't in the spellbook, it's the command ::home. Where can I find that command so I can change the ::home teleport location? Also, I want to change the shops location. Where can I find the code for where the certain shops are located?
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: Changing Home And The Shops
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

If it’s PI -> Commands.java, and spawn-config.cfg

If it’s Delta -> Client.java

If it’s Hyperion -> Good luck finding it because i got no clue.

Read full topic
